StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginImperialismTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Colonizing new worlds is cheaper than invading them, if not as fun.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginXenoExpoltation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Put all those worthless colonists to work doing something useful.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginIndustrialSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of manufacturing and research centers.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginSlaveryTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces the whelps into constructing more advanced facilities.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginConstructionOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces maintenance costs of manufacturing plants.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginMechanizedSlaveryTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: With the right tools, our slavelings can build even more.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginManufacturingFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Encourage our slaves to have an interest in guns.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginManufacturingFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Slaves that eat less and last longer

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginSlaveMills_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The only thing better than cheap slaves are really cheap slaves.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginArtificialSlaves_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Cloning slaves is much faster than waiting for them to grow up.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginPersuasiveResearch_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Force our smartest slaves to be smarter.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginResearchOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves research with the use of creative motivation techniques.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginResearchOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Pack more research slaves into the same amount of space.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginResearchOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Who needs test subjects when you have researchers.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginResearchExtraction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Extract ideas from their smart little brains.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginTechnologicalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Cost of Research improvements.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginDeeperKnowledge_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of reduced torture research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginQuantumUnderstanding_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of torture-free research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginBeyondMortality_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of ultra-torture research facilities. Prepares civilization for Ascension.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginResearchCoordination_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Letting the slaves talk is dangerous but necessary.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginPlanetaryImprovement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: We must whip these new planets into shape.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginPlanetarySpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Force planets to make more food.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginPlanetarySpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Force planets to make more slavelings.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginPlanetarySpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Force planets to be more productive.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginXenoAgriculturalAdaptation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Adapt our livestock to alien environments.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginAgriculturalOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Make our meat farms more efficient.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginAgriculturalOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces maintenance cost of meat farms.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginIntensiveFarming_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of high density meat farms.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginFarmingFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Make our meat crops even meatier.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginFarmingFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Make meat farms even more efficient.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginFarmingFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces maintenance cost of meat farms even more.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginLosslessFarming_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic meat farms.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginProteinResequencing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of Protein sequencing farms.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginXenoBiology_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved medical facilities. Increases population growth.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginPopulationEnhancement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces the population to be stronger and live longer.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginEnvironmentOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Force the planet to be better for manufacturing.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginEnvironmentOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Force the planet to be better for research.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginEnvironmentOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Force the planet to be better for the economy.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginExtremeWorldColonization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Force the slavelings to settle on extreme worlds.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginColonizationFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normalizes Production of Aquatic Worlds, and boost their wealth and Tourism.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginColonizationFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normalizes Production of Frozen Worlds, and boost their Research and Influence.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginColonizationFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normalizes Production of Barren Worlds, and boost their Manufacturing and Military.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginAtmosphericCleansing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Force the slavelings to live and die on radioactive and toxic worlds. Mostly die.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginBiospherePerfection1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normalizes Production of Radioactive Worlds, and boost their Manufacturing output.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginBiospherePerfection2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normalizes Production of Toxic Worlds, and boost their Research output.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginHabitatImprovement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Batter even the unruliest land into shape.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginSoilReclamation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Create useful soil from almost nothing.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginEnvironmentalResequencing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Let's use continents that don't even exist yet.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginEngineeringTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: We can now make hyperdrives and tiny hulls.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginInterstellarTravel_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Gives weaklings more air, as well as better sensors and hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginInterstellarSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be faster.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginInterstellarSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Mass of Colony & Constuctor modules.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginInterstellarSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to travel further.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginIonDriveTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Now we can make hyperdrives that eat more.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginIonOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be faster.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginIonOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our drives to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginIonOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our drives to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginWarpFieldTheory_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Now we can stack hyperfields on top of each other.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginWarpFieldFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to go faster.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginWarpFieldFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our drives to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginWarpFieldFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our drives to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginHyperwarpWaves_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Now we can make hyperdrives more hyper.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginHyperwarpMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our drives to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginHyperwarpMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our drives to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginStellarFoldingTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build the ultimate hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginHyperfieldProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces friendly ships to be faster.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginGravityFieldManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be more maneuverable.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginHyperfieldDisruption_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces enemy ships to be slower.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginStellarFieldProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces friendly ships to be even more faster.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginInterstellarSurvey_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Now we can make better tools for looking at planets.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginSensorOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our sensors to see further.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginSensorOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our sensors to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginSensorOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our sensors to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginEnergyFieldSensors_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Our looking tools have gotten more advanced again!

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginEnergyFieldFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our sensors to see further.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginEnergyFieldFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our sensors to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginEnergyFieldFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our sensors to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginSubspaceSensors_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Our looking tools are now very good looking.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginSensorMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our sensors to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginSensorMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our sensors to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginTargetingAssistTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build targeting and stealth modules.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginTargetingSupport_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build fleet-wide targeting and jamming modules.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginXenoArcheology_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Precursor research to be better.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginPrecursorStudies_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Precursor research to be better.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginPrecursorRelicFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Precursor relic research to be better.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginPrecursorRelicFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Precursor relic cultural benefits to be better.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginPrecursorRelicFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Precursor relic economic benefits to be better.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginPrecursorExploitation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Precursor research to be better.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginPrecursorEngineering_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Precursor research to be better.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginPrecursorUnderstanding_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Precursor research to be better.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginLifeSupport_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Better life support systems makes our ships go further.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginLifeSupportOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to travel further.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginLifeSupportOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our life support systems to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginLifeSupportOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our life support systems to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginSupportFieldGeneration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advanced life support forces our crew to do more with less.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginSupportFieldFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to travel further.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginSupportFieldFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our life support systems to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginSupportFieldFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our life support systems to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginPromethionSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Exotic life support systems feed our crews less than ever.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginLifeSupportMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our life support systems to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginLifeSupportMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our life support systems to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginLosslessSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lossless life support systems humiliate our crews more than ever.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginSupportFieldMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Support fields extend the range of an entire fleet.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginExplorationExtention_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advanced support fields extend a fleet's range even more.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginOrbitalManufacturing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: In orbit we can make bigger, meaner ships.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginOrbitalSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Force our Starports to work better.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginOrbitalSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Force our infrastructure to be more efficient.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginOrbitalSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be packed tighter.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginZeroGravityOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be tougher.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginZeroGravityOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginZeroGravityOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be packed tighter.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginOrbitalConstructionFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be tougher.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginOrbitalConstructionFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginOrbitalConstructionFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be packed tighter.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginHullMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginHullMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be packed tighter.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginHullStrengthening_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our hulls to be tougher.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginHullRepairSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build hull support and repair modules.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginSelfHealingHulls_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build tactical repair modules.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginCarrierFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the construction of cheap and light Interceptor Drones

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginCarrierFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the construction of cheap and light Guardian Drones.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginHighCapacityCarriers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build high capacity carrier modules.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginInterstellarLogistics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Logistics to be better. Lets us build mining facilities.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginLogisticalOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces mines to be more productive.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginFleetLogisticsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Logistics to be way better.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginDeepSpaceLogistics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Logistics to be better still.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginGalacticLogistics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Logistics to be the best.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginHighEfficiencyMining_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our mining facilities to be better.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginResourceExtraction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build highly efficient extractors.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginLosslessMining_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build targeted resource extractors.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginWarfareTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: War isn't the only thing we're good at. But we are really good at it.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginWeaponsSpecializationTech1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Accuracy of all weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginWeaponsSpecializationTech2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Mass of all weapons systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginWeaponsSpecializationTech3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Cost of all weapons systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginBeamWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build stronger beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginBeamWeaponOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our beam weapons to do more damage.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginBeamWeaponOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our beam weapons to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginBeamWeaponOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our beam weapons to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginMatterDisruption_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build advanced beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginHighEnergyFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our beam weapons to do more damage.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginHighEnergyFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our beam weapons to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginHighEnergyFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our beam weapons to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginPlasmaProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build extra deadly beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginBeamWeaponMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our beam weapons to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginBeamWeaponMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our beam weapons to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginEnergyPhasing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build face-meltingly powerful beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginDoomRayTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build the ultimate beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginBeamWeaponAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces a fleet's beam weapons to be better.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginHighEnergyTransfer_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces a fleet's beam weapons to be extra better.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginHighEnergyMagnification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces a fleet's beam weapons to be much extra better.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginMissileOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces missile launchers to shoot faster.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginWarheadFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces missile launchers to shoot farther.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginPhotonTorpedos_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build crazy dangerous missiles.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginNightmareTorpedoTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build world ending missiles.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginMissileAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces a fleet's missile weapons to be better.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginAdvancedMissileGuidance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces a fleet's missile weapons to be extra better.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginIntelligentWarheads_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces a fleet's missile weapons to be much extra better.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginKineticWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build better kinetic weapons

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginKineticOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our kinetic weapons to shoot further.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginKineticOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our kinetic weapons to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginKineticOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our kinetic weapons to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginPulseCannonTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build more deadly kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginKineticAccelerationFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our kinetic weapons to shoot further.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginKineticAccelerationFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our kinetic weapons to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginKineticAccelerationFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our kinetic weapons to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginGravitonThrower_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build very dangerous kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginKineticMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our kinetic weapons to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginKineticMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our kinetic weapons to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginQuantumDrivers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build impossibly deadly kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginSingularityDrivers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build the ultimate kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginKineticAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces a fleet's kinetic weapons to be better.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginMassManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces a fleet's kinetic weapons to be extra better.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginInertialMagnification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces a fleet's kinetic weapons to be much extra better.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginMilitarizationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build military shipyards and defense platforms.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginMilitarySpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our soldiers to be better.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginMilitarySpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our planetary defenses to be better.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginMilitarySpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase our colonies ability to resist invaders.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginPlanetaryInvasion_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build transports to invade planets.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginInvasionOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows Planetary Bombardments to be conducted during invasions.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginInvasionOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows Informational Warfare tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginInvasionOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows Biological Warfare tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginStallerMarines_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves soldier effectiveness and transport capacity.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginGravitationalFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows tidal disruption tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginGravitationalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows core detonation tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginDroneSoldiers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces soldiers to be more effective and transports to carry more.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginAdvancedInvasionTactics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces soldiers to be more effective and transports to carry more.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginFortification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides stronger defense against planetary bombardment.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginDefensiveFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes all colonies Immune to Planetary Bombardment.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginDefensiveFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes all colonies Immune to Information Warfare.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginDefensiveFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes all colonies Immune to Biological Warfare.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginOrbitalDefencePlatform_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of planetary defense dome, improves planetary defense.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginDefenseSystemTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build defensive systems for our ships.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginDefensiveSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our shields to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginDefensiveSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our armor to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginShieldSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build better shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginShieldOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our shields to be stronger.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginShieldOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our shields to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginShieldOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our shields to be lighter.

StringTable.String: Lets us build really great shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginBarrierSystemFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our shields to be stronger.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginBarrierSystemFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our shields to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginBarrierSystemFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our shields to be lighter.

StringTable.String: Lets us build exotic shield systems.

StringTable.String: Forces our shields to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginShieldMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our shields to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginInvulnerabilityTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build the best shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginShieldSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build shield support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginShieldAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build better shield support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginPointDefenses_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build better point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginPointDefenseOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our point defenses to be better.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginPointDefenseOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our point defenses to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginPointDefenseOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our point defenses to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginCounterMeasures_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build even better point defenses.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginCounterMeasureFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our point defenses to be better.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginCounterMeasureFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our point defenses to be cheaper.

StringTable.String: Forces our point defenses to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginDroneSentrySystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build exotic point defenses.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginDroneSystemMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our point defenses to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginDroneSystemMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our point defenses to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginArreonMissileDefenseTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build the ultimate point defenses.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginPointDefenseSupportSystem_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build fleet point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginPointDefenseAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build even better fleet point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginArmorOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our armor to be stronger.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginArmorOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our armor to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginArmorOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our armor to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginDurantiumCompositeTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build way tougher armor.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginArmorFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our armor to be stronger.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginArmorFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our armor to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginArmorFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our armor to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginArmorMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our armor to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginArmorMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our armor to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginZeroPointArmorTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build the ultimate armor.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginArmorSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build fleet armor-support fields.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginArmorEnhancement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build better fleet armor-support fields.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginCommunicationsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us research technology for intimidating our food.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginTranslatorTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us communicate with our food.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginDiplomaticSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our Diplomats to be better.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginDiplomaticSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Get better deals when trading with other races.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginInterstellarGovernance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Stellar Empire form of government.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginPoliticalSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of the Slave-Master Party.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginPoliticalSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of the Coddling Party.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginPoliticalSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of the Dominion Party.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginGalacticGovernance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Galactic Republic form of government.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginPoliticalFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of the Plundering Party.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginPoliticalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of the Thievery Party.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginPoliticalFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of the Smart Party.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginInterstellarDemocracyTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Interstellar Democracy form of government.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginPoliticalMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of the War Party.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginPoliticalMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of the Pre-War Party.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginStarFederationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Star Federation form of government.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginDiplomacyTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build embassies and form basic treaties.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginInterstellarAlliances_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Let us build improved diplomatic buildings. Increases Diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginEminenceTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build advanced diplomatic buildings. Increases Diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginUnitedPlanetsLobbyist_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks additional Resolutions to be proposed.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginUnitedPlanetsClout_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks more powerful Resolutions to be proposed.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginCulturalInfluence_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build boring civilian buildings.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginCulturalOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces others to like us more.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginCulturalOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our cultural buildings to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginCulturalOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces cultural buildings to cost less to run.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginCulturalOutreach_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build improved boring civilian buildings.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginCulturalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Influence on planets with high approval.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginStellarEmigration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build advanced cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginCulturalAssimilation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build exotic cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginCulturalDomination_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Let us build the ultimate cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginXenoCommerce_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic economic buildings and freighters.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginCommerceSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces a planet to trade more.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginXenoEconomics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build improved economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginBlackMarketTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build a Black Market.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginInterstellarBanking_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build advanced economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginEconomicFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our trade routes to make more money.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginEconomicFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Force tourists to spend more money.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginFinancialSectorsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build exotic economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginGalacticStockMarket_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build the ultimate economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginInterstellarTrade_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginTradeOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases overall value of trade routes

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginTradeOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the establishment of one additional trade route.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginGalacticTrade_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Let us build improved trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginTradeFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: All starbases now give a significant boost to the trade income of colonies with their Area of Effect.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginTradeFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the establishment of one additional trade route

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginGalacticFacilitation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build advanced trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginApprovalFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the morale of your colonies.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginApprovalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes building Entertainment Improvements much cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginApprovalFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly reduces the Maintenance required by Entertainment Improvements.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginWondersoftheGalaxy_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build advanced tourism structures.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_DrenginHomageTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build the Temple of Strength.
